name: gatehub-wallet
title: GateHub Wallet
description: This extension will connect to your GateHub wallet through API keys. You will be able to search through your wallets and copy wallet address. Currently, only support for sandbox environment.
author: golobitch

commands.name: searchWallet
commands.title: Search GateHub wallets
commands.subtitle: GateHub Wallet
commands.description: This command will show all your wallets

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
